A special SPI interface for ST7920 controller
Update for ATOMIC operation done (01 Jun 2013) U8G_ATOMIC_OR(ptr, val) U8G_ATOMIC_AND(ptr, val) U8G_ATOMIC_START(); U8G_ATOMIC_END();
*/
